See also: taxi, táxi, and taxi-

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • Taxe f (colloquial; becoming dated)

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from French taxi.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈtaksi/
  • audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Taxi n or m (genitive Taxis, plural Taxis or Taxen)

  1. taxi, cab

Usage notes[edit]

Alternative masculine form (“der Taxi") in Switzerland (rare).
